nodes.text: Predators for Hire: A Guide to Star Wars Bounty Hunters

"Predators for Hire: A Guide to Star Wars Bounty Hunters" was a fold-out poster article in Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 6, written by Andy Mangels. It profiled Star Wars bounty hunters Boba Fett, Dengar, Boushh, Greedo, IG-88B, Skorr, Zuckuss, Bossk, Beilert Valance, Jodo Kast, Gallandro, and 4-LOM.
